text: Sihamtara purbararti nuha, ada arau chamudara sampradaya, ibraahimara sampradaya arau mada'iyana lagate bidhbasta nagarara adhibasisakalara sambada sihamtara ocarata aha na'ine? Sihamtara ocarata spasta pramanadisaha sihamtara raachulasakala ahichila. Eteke allaha enekuraa nahaya ye, sihamtara oparata an'yaya karaiche baram sihamta nije'i nijara pratihe an'yaya karaichila
